## ICreateVerifiableCredentialLDArgs interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Encapsulates the parameters required to create a [W3C Verifiable Credential](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#credentials)

This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICreateVerifiableCredentialLDArgs
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                                         | Modifiers | Type              | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [credential](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablecredentialldargs.credential.md)                    |           | CredentialPayload | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The json payload of the Credential according to the [canonical model](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#credentials)</p><p>The signer of the Credential is chosen based on the <code>issuer.id</code> property of the <code>credential</code></p><p><code>@context</code>, <code>type</code> and <code>issuanceDate</code> will be added automatically if omitted</p> |
| [fetchRemoteContexts?](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablecredentialldargs.fetchremotecontexts.md) |           | boolean           | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <i>(Optional)</i> Set this to true if you want the <code>@context</code> URLs to be fetched in case they are not preloaded.</p><p>Defaults to <code>false</code></p>                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [keyRef?](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablecredentialldargs.keyref.md)                           |           | string            | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. The key handle () from the internal database.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
